page.title: 16Clubs in Cannington
page.content: On Monday there is the Choir in the Church with the Rev. Applegarth from 6.00 p.m. to 7.00 p.m. On Tuesday there is Athletics Club at Rodway Playing Field. From 6.00 to 6.45 p.m. is the Minors' Club for younger children, from 7.00 to 8.00 p.m. is the Juniors' Club and from 8.00 to 9.00 p.m. is the Seniors' Club. In July there are the Club Championships. On Wednesday the Brownies meet from 6.30 to 8.00 p.m. On Thursday the orchestra meets in the Art Room at school from 5.30 to 6.30 p.m. taken by Mrs. Ayres. Also on Thursday the Badminton Club meets from 6.30 to 8.3o p.m. On Friday the Treasure Seekers' Club meet from 6.00 to 7.00 p.m. Those are all the out-of-school clubs in Cannington.
